attributes.action: Could the goverment allow those who passes there motorcycle test on a scooter to ride a scooter with gears
attributes.additional_details: When you pass your A1 motorcycle test on an automatic scooter thats all you can ride I would like the goverment to allow riders to ride scooters with gears where the gears are changed by twisting the handlebars not by using a foot pedal there should be a scooter licence that covers all scooters automatic or manual as long as there is no foot pedal to change gears
